name: Pyfibot
body: pyfibot ======= A Python IRC-bot made using the Twisted Matrix IRC-library. Supports online module reloading - only major core changes require a restart. Extensive module & handler -support for easy extension and customization. Module hilights --------------- - URL title fetching with custom handlers for IMDb, Youtube and many others - Wolfram Alpha searches Features -------- - Modular - Live refresh of modules - Coder friendly (a basic module requires just 2 lines of boilerplate code) - SSL-support - IPv6-support - Optional virtualenv-support Support can be found at #pyfibot on irc.nerv.fi and please contact yllapito@nerv.fi if you want to connect outside of Finland (will be changed) or need help with IRC-network.
